ComicInfo.Title: Awakening II - Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
“AWAKENINGS II,” Part One
The Holy has been desecrated, the Hammer is closing in, and the Dunridge case hits a snag…one that only reinforces Morgan’s growing suspicion that the killer he and Rowan are seeking may be none other than Rowan herself.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Nicola Scott & Eric Trautmann | 1 | | B | Cover B | Michael Lark | 2 |
ComicInfo.Characters: Rowan Black,Anne-Marie,Nicky Colt,Haight,Brian Freeman,Laurent Leveque,Alex Grey,Justin Pegg,Morgan Chaffey,Russ Fiegley,Hawthorne,Paige,Monica Innes,Stepan Hahn
